simulator

Class Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.Path
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PathFull, PathFullPrefix, PathOnTheFly

    public abstract class Path
extends java.lang.Object
    Classes that store and manipulate a path though a model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Path()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Path

        public Path()

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public abstract void initialise(State initialState,
                                double[] initialStateRewards)
        Initialise the path with an initial state and rewards. Note: State object and array will be copied, not stored directly.

      • addStep

        public abstract void addStep(int choice,
                             int actionIndex,
                             double probability,
                             double[] transRewards,
                             State newState,
                             double[] newStateRewards,
                             TransitionList transitionList)
        Add a step to the path. Note: State object and arrays will be copied, not stored directly.

      • addStep

        public abstract void addStep(double time,
                             int choice,
                             int actionIndex,
                             double probability,
                             double[] transRewards,
                             State newState,
                             double[] newStateRewards,
                             TransitionList transitionList)
        Add a timed step to the path. Note: State object and arrays will be copied, not stored directly.

      • continuousTime

        public abstract boolean continuousTime()
        Check whether this path includes continuous-time information, e.g. delays for a CTMC.

      • size

        public abstract long size()
        Get the size of the path (number of steps; or number of states - 1).

      • getPreviousState

        public abstract State getPreviousState()
        Get the previous state, i.e. the penultimate state of the current path.

      • getCurrentState

        public abstract State getCurrentState()
        Get the current state, i.e. the current final state of the path.

      • getPreviousModuleOrActionIndex

        public abstract int getPreviousModuleOrActionIndex()
        Get the index i of the action taken in the previous step. If i>0, then i-1 is the index of an action label (0-indexed) If i<0, then -i-1 is the index of a module (0-indexed)

      • getPreviousModuleOrAction

        public abstract java.lang.String getPreviousModuleOrAction()
        Get a string describing the action/module of the previous step.

      • getPreviousProbability

        public abstract double getPreviousProbability()
        Get the probability or rate associated wuth the previous step.

      • getTotalTime

        public abstract double getTotalTime()
        Get the total time elapsed so far (where zero time has been spent in the current (final) state). For discrete-time models, this is just the number of steps (but returned as a double).

      • getTimeInPreviousState

        public abstract double getTimeInPreviousState()
        For paths with continuous-time info, get the time spent in the previous state.

      • getTotalCumulativeReward

        public abstract double getTotalCumulativeReward(int rsi)
        Get the total reward accumulated so far (includes reward for previous transition but no state reward for current (final) state).
        Parameters:
        rsi - Reward structure index

      • getPreviousStateReward

        public abstract double getPreviousStateReward(int rsi)
        Get the state reward for the previous state. (For continuous-time models, need to multiply this by time spent in the state.)
        Parameters:
        rsi - Reward structure index

      • getPreviousStateRewards

        public abstract double[] getPreviousStateRewards()
        Get the state rewards for the previous state. (For continuous-time models, need to multiply these by time spent in the state.)

      • getPreviousTransitionReward

        public abstract double getPreviousTransitionReward(int rsi)
        Get the transition reward for the transition between the previous and current states.
        Parameters:
        rsi - Reward structure index

      • getPreviousTransitionRewards

        public abstract double[] getPreviousTransitionRewards()
        Get the transition rewards for the transition between the previous and current states.

      • getCurrentStateReward

        public abstract double getCurrentStateReward(int rsi)
        Get the state reward for the current state. (For continuous-time models, need to multiply this by time spent in the state.)
        Parameters:
        rsi - Reward structure index

      • getCurrentStateRewards

        public abstract double[] getCurrentStateRewards()
        Get the state rewards for the current state. (For continuous-time models, need to multiply these by time spent in the state.)

      • isLooping

        public abstract boolean isLooping()
        Does the path contain a deterministic loop?

      • loopStart

        public abstract long loopStart()
        What is the step index of the start of the deterministic loop, if it exists?

      • loopEnd

        public abstract long loopEnd()
        What is the step index of the end of the deterministic loop, if it exists?
